snippet: The deal will allow Nielsen to better track the public’s media consumption across television, radio and range of electronic devices.
abstract: Nielsen Holdings says it has completed its $1.26 billion acquisition of radio ratings company Arbitron; deal will allow it to better track public's media consumption across television, radio and range of electronic devices.
lead_paragraph: The deal will allow Nielsen to better track the public’s media consumption across television, radio and range of electronic devices.

headline.main: Nielsen Deal For Arbitron Is Complete
headline.print_headline: Nielsen Deal For Arbitron Is Complete
